subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Why is it so Quiet here?
author: RetroCom
full_text:
I see in this YouTube video  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-wQZ7FU2Vc  Where Chris Moon is holding on to the antenna for enhanced effect. Does anyone know if Frank uses this same method when he records?
Thanks,
Dave

--- warrior18eii@... wrote:

From: "Frank" <warrior18eii@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Why is it so Quiet here?
Date: Tue, 26 Jun 2007 23:58:44 -0000

Yeah Steve, I'm not real vocal to begin with but it has been
abnormally slow. I think everyone is real busy getting their ducks in
a row for the upcoming holiday.  Who knows? LOL 

Yeah, Rosemary wrote the articles for TAPS mag and its probably one of
the best portrayals of the Frank's box there is. At least Rosemary
actually spoke with, witnessed and interviewed people who know a
little about this machine, to include Frank himself. Its nice to read
a positive, informed account rather than the guessing and stabbing in
the dark I have heard and written by ignorant naysayers.

Kudos Rosemary!

Frank R.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> This is an incredible field and nobody has posted in days.  Just 
> thought i'd throw it out there and maybe get somebody's attention.  
> I'll have to post more files i guess to keep this going.  The box was 
> in TAPS paramag, anybody read that?
>
